short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enrich and import LinkedIn profiles to Careerlink

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your recruiting by seamlessly adding contact information (email and phone) and importing candidates from LinkedIn to Careerlink for SMS and email communication and automated messaging. Also receive new SMS message alerts from candidates anytime.
